alert.note: Alert for Crawford (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued February 22 at 4:25PM CST until February 22 at 5:15PM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CST FOR LAWRENCE AND CRAWFORD COUNTIES... At 425 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Hutsonville to near Sumner, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Robinson and Hutsonville around 430 PM CST. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Lawrenceville, Russellville and Vincennes. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for southeastern and east central Illinois. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
